reviewText: The Commish is one of my all time favorite police dramas.  We watched it when it was on tv and were glad to see it out on dvd.  Michael Chiklis does a great job portraying a serious police official, who is also a loving family man.  There is plenty of action, heart-warming moments and a few comedic elements, also.

reviewText: I love this series. I found it very a entertaining cop story. I always enjoy Michael Chiklis in most everything he does.

reviewText: I purchased Seasons 1 and 2 when Amazon had a sale recently and I certainly am glad that I did.  This show combines both crime solving and  humor and I look forward to purchasing any other seasons.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Michael Chiklis plays his role of a police commissioner of a suburbian New York community to the letter. The stories told here in this set are very well written dealing with family drama as well as police action.  These episodes can be enjoyed by the entire family. As a teenager, I watched these episodes with my mom and dad and we all enjoyed them. This is quality television!
Title: N/A

reviewText: While some of the detective series of his time are very boring,  Commish's down to earth personality, his understanding of people, and his devotion to his family make this series very entertaining. It touches on serious issues while bringing in the importance of family and family issues.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Good show, not too graphic, not too harsh, just the right mix to make it entertaining
Title: N/A

reviewText: I got this DVD collection and also Season 1 for my mom who absolutely loved the Commish.At the time she was very sick with end stage Pulmonary Fibrosis.  She passed away this past July.She had the chance to watch these DVD's over and over again giving her some very pleasurable, happy moments at a very sad time in her life.  The episode where Rachel has her baby and Cyd helps her is priceless.I would highly recommend this series to everyone.  However, just one note: If you have seen Michael Chiklis in his other series The Shield and are looking for a similar type show, you will be dissapointed because The Commish is very different.  He is the teddybear of police commissioners.  As his character puts it - he regulates human behavior.  He doesn't bully people and for the most part doesn't even lose his temper:)  I just love him.
Title: N/A

reviewText: continued episodes were very "real", funny, and focused on key issues familes deal with.  acting great.  sorry to see "Paulie" go, but could see it heading that way.

reviewText: We remember "The Commish" fondly and sought to add this to our DVD library.  The service was excellent but the quality of the DVD set was defective.  I was disappointed that a replacement was not offered, only a refund.
